## Association

```{r association}
library(ggplot2)

intensities <- read.delim("../output-files/compound_intensities_assoc.txt", stringsAsFactors = F)
sample.info <- read.delim("../project-files/sample_info.txt")
case.rows <- intensities$sample_id %in% sample.info$sample_id[sample.info$class == "case"]
control.rows <- intensities$sample_id %in% sample.info$sample_id[sample.info$class == "control"]

assoc.out.file <- "../output-files/assoc_results.txt"
for (i in 2:ncol(intensities)) {
  compound <- names(intensities)[i]
  ttest <- t.test(intensities[case.rows,i], intensities[control.rows,i])
  p_value <- ttest$p.value
  case_mean <- ttest$estimate[1]
  control_mean <- ttest$estimate[2]
  log2_fold_change <- case_mean - control_mean
  out.frame <- data.frame(compound, log2_fold_change, p_value)
  write.table(out.frame, assoc.out.file,  sep="\t", quote=F, row.names=F, col.names=(i==2), append=(i!=2))
}
```

## Volcano plot

```{r volcano}
assoc.frame <- read.delim(assoc.out.file)
dim(assoc.frame)
ggplot(data = assoc.frame, aes(x = log2_fold_change, y = -1*log10(p_value))) + geom_point()
```

## Assess significance

```{r p_values}
hist(assoc.frame$p_value, xlab="p_value", main="Histogram of p-values")
assoc.frame$fdr_p_value <- p.adjust(assoc.frame$p_value, method = "fdr")
summary(assoc.frame$fdr_p_value)
```
